item.title: New Walls Are Alive Paper
item.content_encoded: A newly reformatted version of the classic The Walls Are Alive graffiti guide is now available in a similar format to our A Civillian's Guide to Direct Action, maximized for table-appeal and cost-effective distribution. 25 copies will run you $2. A Guide Mix Kit of The Walls Are Alive and A Civillian's Guide to Direct Action is also now available, 25 papers (a 12/13 mix) for $2. You can grab the hi-res PDF, free-of-charge, right here. Speaking of PDFs, sadly this announcement also serves to notify you that DIY Guide II is no longer in print. To date we've distributed more than 60,000 of them into the world, and due to its disproportionately high-cost of printing, we feel at this point it is best presented as a free PDF in our downloads library. Enjoy and use well!
